text:
~MvIqrya#saMmitOq vENu#nAq vi mi#mIta AgnEqyO vai vENu#H sayOniqtvAyaq yaju#ShA yunaktiq yaju#ShA kRuShatiq vyAvRu#ttyai ShaDgaqvEna# kRuShatiq ShaD vA Ruqtava# RuqtuBi#rEqvaina#M kRuShatiq yad dvA#daSagaqvEna# saM~MvathsaqrENaiqvE yaM ~MvA aqgnE-ra#tidAqhAda#biBEqth saitad dvi#guqNama#paSyat kRuqShTaM cAkRu#ShTaM 
caq tatOq vA iqmAM nA&tya#dahaqdyat kRuqShTaM cAkRu#ShTaM caq - [  ] 26
